resources.string: A rich, creamy dessert made from cream cheese, sugar, and a biscuit or pastry crust.
A fragrant South Asian rice dish cooked with marinated chicken, spices, and herbs.
A flavorful Middle Eastern rice dish spiced with cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, and served with chicken.
A spicy, tangy seafood dish of crab cooked in a savory chili-tomato sauce.
Deep-fried balls or patties made from ground chickpeas, herbs, and spices.
Fresh fish coated in spices and shallow or deep-fried until crispy.
Thin, deep-fried potato strips seasoned with salt.
Meat, seafood, or vegetables cooked over an open flame or hot surface for a smoky flavor.
Long, thin dough strands boiled and served in stir-fries, soups, or sauces.
A flaky, layered flatbread popular in South India and Sri Lanka.
Prawns seasoned with spices and pan-fried or deep-fried until golden.
Meat marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in a traditional clay oven (tandoor).
An aromatic Yemeni rice dish with slow-cooked meat and Middle Eastern spices.
